# NotificationQueue.PostingStyle.whenIdle

**Case**

The notification is posted when the run loop is idle.

## Declaration

```swift
case whenIdle
```

## Constants

- **NotificationQueue.PostingStyle.asap**: The notification is posted at the end of the current notification callout or timer.
- **NotificationQueue.PostingStyle.now**: The notification is posted immediately after coalescing.
